dataset_id: CMS: Soil CO2 Efflux and Properties, Site Vegetation Measurements, Mexico, 2011-2012
title: CMS: Soil CO2 Efflux and Properties, Site Vegetation Measurements, Mexico, 2011-2012
summary: This data set provides the results of (1) monthly measurements of soil CO2 efflux, volumetric water content, and temperature, and (2) seasonal measurements of soil (porosity, bulk density, nitrogen (N) and carbon (C) content) and vegetation (leaf area index (LAI), litter and fine root biomass) properties in a water-limited ecosystem in Baja California, Mexico.  Measurements and samples were collected from August 2011 to August 2012.

Measurements and samples were collected from August 2011 to August 2012.

citation: Phillips, C.L., B. Bond-Lamberty, A.R. Desai, M. Lavoie, D. Risk, J. Tang, K. Todd-Brown, and R. Vargas. 2016. The value of soil respiration measurements for interpreting and modeling terrestrial carbon cycling. Plant and Soil. 413(1-2):1-25.
